table-bug.html

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

Tried to print a Web page using the following settings

Page size: A4
Page margin (in Page Setup): all 0
Page header/foot (in Page Setup): all "--blank--"


Actual results:

There is only 1 page output. The table is truncated at page break. The whole content following the table is also missing.


Expected results:

2 pages of output should be produced. The words "The End" should appear on page two.

comments.text:
This bug is extremely difficult to reproduce bug once the settings is right it is consistently reproducible. Additional information:

- the print settings must be exact
- the Portrait mode should be used 
- this is reproducible in Print Preview
- if it doesn't work for you, you may adjust the number of <li> entries in the attached HTML so that the row boundary hit exactly the page break area
- the default paper size in Firefox is "Letter", to change it to A4 you must do it in Printer Properties. Actually print to a paper (or virtual printer like Windows' XPS writer) so that the paper size setting is saved for Print Preview so it can be reproduced there.
